Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 2014...
Injured on 6/5/2014 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Cleveland on 2/2/2015 (Going to CLE: CF Brett Jackson, P Casey Janssen, P George Botella. Going to CHC: C Carlos Santana, C Drew Stiner, C Tony Wolters, SS Ronny Rodri
guez, 1B William Leis)...
Traded from Cleveland to Toronto on 7/29/2017 (Going to TOR: RF Domonic Brown, P George Botella. Going to CLE: P Tom Widdle, CF Jemile Weeks)...
Injured on 5/25/2018 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/5/2021...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Had first career hit on 7/13/2022, off Sonny Gray (WAS)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2023, going 3-0, 0.99...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,621,429 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,621,429 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
1/31/2026: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,621,429 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2026 Allstar game...

10/31/2027: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $5,620,000 per year, for 4 years.
